feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • sort table names alphabetically when selecting data source by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15110
  • App service API typing - D -> R by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15112
  • Add automation survey popup by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15119
  • Fix schema exporting. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15123
  • Final app service API typing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15120
  • Update to TypeScript 5.7.2. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.24...3.2.25

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Worker service API typing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15129
  • handle cases where datasourceName is undefined when sorting datasources by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.25...3.2.26

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automation fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15081
  • 3.0 metrics by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15118
  • Update eslint by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15130
  • Get us much closer to using the recommended set of lints. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15142
  • Enable a variety of useful looking lints. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15143
  • Tidy monorepo setup by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15128
  • Stop coercing all values to strings when using CoreCheckboxGroup by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15136
  • Disable filter value binding input when no column is selected in filter screen by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15147

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.26...3.2.27

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update outdated rollup deps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15151
  • Fix string-templates on dev by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15159
  • Bump path-to-regexp from 0.1.11 to 0.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15135
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15167
  • Custom role in groups issue by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15166
  • Fix for fetching schemas in Postgres 9.5 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.27...3.2.28

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix client error SVG by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15161
  • Automation Branching UX updates by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15001
  • API typing fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15171
  • Relationship searching on tables with spaces by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15172
  • Prevent syncing row changes between users for views filtered by current user by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15163
  • API typing fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15182
  • Updating pro to latest (small API change). by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.28...3.2.29
